Это дополнительный уровень демонстрирущего добавление диманического освещения HDR в игровой движок sourse . Мне это понравилась , было особенно интересно слушать как разработчики говорили как что создавалось . Если вам интересно послушать как разработчики создавали что то в игре , и пару минут побегать по карте и пострелять в комбаинов , то советую.

I spent all these hours on this "game", I spent these hours on skips, now I can beat this game under 2 minutes, I skipped the entire church, the fisherman, even the elevator at the end, I spent all this time, I even got a pulse ball, there is one, I found out how to go to the other island, without the guide's way, you just rocket jump and the water does the rest for you, I found out how to make everything not do anything, atleast the ai, I found out how to go out of bounds, and under the map, I found out how to go to the main city, unlike the guide, all of this without cheats, this "game" is fun, and it is fun to speed run, and it is fun to break it, it is fun in general, it feels like a secret when you find a text box you never seen, it is fun to hang out at the other island, it is fun to skip things, it is fun to explore the map, even in intended ways, it is fun to rocket jump to the only combine elite, it is fun to "win" but you actually die, and it is fun to waste nearly a day's worth of hours in this game, and it is fun to play without breaking it, and it is fun making a review on it, and it is fun to wait to redownload it, it is now done, bye.

Half Life 2 un très bon, je fus ravi de pouvoir apprendre comment les développeurs avaient créer la lumière du jeu, l'eau ou encore les visages. Vous pourrez aussi apprendre toutes les astuces pour créer un bon niveau difficile mais avec quelques aides pour ceux qui savent un peu chercher. Vraiment intéressant si vous avez aimez Half-Life 2 et comment ne pas l'aimez.

Half-Life 2: Lost Coast es un gran escenario donde se podían apreciar algunas de las mejoras graficas que podríamos disfrutar más adelante en las siguientes entregas, aunque el juego es extremadamente corto, quiero pensar que solo era eso, una demostración gráfica, a pesar del echo que se mencionó de que era originalmente programado para ser una parte del capítulo de Carretera 17 de Half Life 2, pero termino siendo cancelado como escenario del tal y paso a ser una entrega separada, sus escenarios son bellos y se disfrutan visualmente, destaco la hermosa catedral que es como el centro donde se lleva a cabo la acción del juego, nos podemos dar cuenta del desarrollo del juego gracias a la interacción con los desarrolladores por medio de los globos de dialogo dispersos en el capítulo, se agradece que hayan incorporado al personaje de la costa que nos hace ver que se molestan en no reciclar siempre los mismos personajes, por sobre todo es un gran capitulo recomendable para cualquier fan de la saga de Half Life, pero al ser un solo capitulo, es demasiado corto y ni siquiera se da el motivo por el cual estamos ahí, se podría teorizar que podría ser obra de los vortigaunt, pero no hay nada que lo asegure, solo nos dan la orden de subir para acabar con la amenaza y volver, a pesar de no aportar nada de importante a Half Life 2 y sus posteriores entregas, es un capítulo más que nos deja disfrutar esta hermosa saga.
It takes about 20 minutes and it's got some interesting (albeit dated) commentary. If you have time to spare and want a short excursion into the Half-Life universe, give it a try.

En fait, ce n'est pas un jeu ni une extension. C'est juste une mission retiré du jeu original avec de meilleur graphismes. Entk entre 20 minutes de ce ''jeu'' la ou bien 20 minutes de DayZ, je prend directe les 20 minutes de Half-life.
It's pretty neat.

Court et intense, ce pseudo-chapitre n'est qu'un prétexte pour des tests de développement ; pour le joueur, Lost Coast reste une expérience frustrante et sans aucun sens, loin de l'histoire des autres opus. Dommage !

A small map created by valve, originally to showcase new Source Engine lighting techniques. Based off of cut Half-Life 2 content Saint Olga was actually supposed to take place around the cut Borealis chapter in the earlier versions of Half-Life 2. Despite its short length is worth playing at least once as the level of quality you do get for the short length is extremely high, the level design is on point and is very compelling to play the whole way through. Its also interesting to look at what is essentially Beta content reporpused and completed in such a way that you could almost see it being shoved in the retail game. Good stuff and its free so fuck it right? Might as well.

Okay. First of all this "game" is actually longer than I thought because of other people saying how short it is. It is interesting and it really shows what Source engine is capable of. Basically this is Source engine and Half-Life 2 gameplay in a nutshell. I'm one of the biggest Half-Life fans and Lost Coast is cool level in my opinion. I would recommend it to every Half-Life fan or amateur or basically anyone else. I know it's short but for a short map i love it.

Breve sezione che doveva far parte del gioco principale e che serve come benchmark per il proprio PC per Half-Life 2.
Davvero molto interessanti i commenti degli sviluppatori, che illustrano aneddoti e soluzioni tecniche adottate per ottenere un determinato risultato o situazione nel gioco.

HALF-LIFE 2: LOST COAST-самая загадочная игра от Valve!!! И весьма атмосферная. Изначально она была частью главы "Шоссе 17" в HALF-LIFE 2. Но затем Гейб Логан Ньюэлл, посоветовавшись с коллегами, решил сделать данный уровень самостоятельной игрой. Основная цель-демонстрация того, на что способен новый игровой движок SOURCE (в первую очередь революционная для того времени технология HDR). Также в данном проекте впервые используется система комментариев.

Игру рекомендую всем!!!

10 старых рыбаков из 10!!!

Half Life 2: One of the best games I've ever played. 
Lost Coast: 'That's it?'

It took me less than an hour to finish it (it logged 2 hours because I walked away from my computer, bored). Very disappointed to say the least. They tease you with tons of background scenery - which made me think there was MUCH more to the level than it turned out to be. The gameplay is identical, but it's just WAY TOO SHORT! Very anti-climactic. Glad it was part of a bundle so at least I can play HL2 again. This product should have been 'lost' in the planning stage.

This DLC is actually a game commentary about how the developers designed their game. It's nice to know, kind of an interactive "making of documentary" of the game.
